医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
了解蛋白酶体功能障碍如何导致与年龄相关的认知能力下降大约 40% 65 岁以上的人患有某种形式的与年龄相关的记忆丧失，这使他们患痴呆症和阿尔茨海默病的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Understanding-how-proteasome-dysfunction-contributes-to-age-lated-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Understanding-how-proteasome-dysfunction-contributes-to-age-lated-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0232aee9-7e41-438a-8053-862065d8f236 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:17:49 -0500 Understanding how proteasome dysfunction contributes to age-related cognitive decline
线粒体视角解释与卵巢早衰的遗传联系不孕症影响着全球约 4800 万对夫妇，其原因有多种。在包括人类在内的哺乳动物中，卵子是在卵巢中产生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Genetic-link-to-premature-ovarian-insufficiency-explained-A-mitochondrial-perspective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Genetic-link-to-premature-ovarian-insufficiency-explained-A-mitochondrial-perspective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc60244f-16a0-45bb-a35d-ac2750c92d1f Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:10:00 -0500 Genetic link to premature ovarian insufficiency explained: A mitochondrial perspective
睡眠模式非常不规律的人患痴呆症的风险可能更高根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2023 年 12 月 13 日发表的新研究，睡眠模式非常不规则的人可能比睡眠模式较规律的人患痴呆症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/People-with-very-irregular-sleep-patterns-may-have-higher-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/People-with-very-irregular-sleep-patterns-may-have-higher-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46290435-ebb8-4ece-8f63-970b88d2ed65 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:02:39 -0500 People with very irregular sleep patterns may have higher dementia risk
特发性嗜睡可能并不像以前想象的那么罕见尽管晚上休息良好，但白天仍很困的人可能患有称为特发性嗜睡症的睡眠障碍。新的研究发现这种神经系统疾病可能并不像以前想象的那么罕见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Idiopathic-hypersomnia-may-not-be-as-rare-as-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Idiopathic-hypersomnia-may-not-be-as-rare-as-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a29d087-dc41-4be0-aec8-48306922e958 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 20:58:18 -0500 Idiopathic hypersomnia may not be as rare as previously thought
研究揭示了微小结肠炎患者的治疗差距和症状负担这是腹泻的一个隐藏原因，人们对这种疾病的发展知之甚少。多种因素不利于微小结肠炎（一种炎症性消化疾病）的诊断，因为与其他原因引起的慢性腹泻患者相比，其症状困扰仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-reveals-treatment-gaps-and-burden-of-symptoms-among-患者-with-microoscopy-colitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-reveals-treatment-gaps-and-burden-of-symptoms-among-患者-with-microoscopy-colitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b02c94b-2d8b-45a0-b085-38f720dcc773 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 20:49:19 -0500 Study reveals treatment gaps and burden of symptoms among patients with microscopic colitis
研究发现有认知障碍的人对医疗保健不太满意罗格斯大学研究人员发表的一项研究表明，患有自闭症、注意力缺陷和记忆丧失等认知障碍的人对医疗保健的满意度低于普通人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-finds-people-with-cognitive-disability-are-less-satisfied-with-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-finds-people-with-cognitive-disability-are-less-satisfied-with-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b0e9225-e64c-4069-8294-daf7e50a7778 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 09:32:33 -0500 Study finds people with cognitive disabilities are less satisfied with health care
轻度活动有望对抗儿童肥胖一项新的后续研究表明，从童年到成年早期久坐时间的增加会导致身体脂肪和腹部脂肪增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Light-activity-holds-promise-for-combating-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Light-activity-holds-promise-for-combating-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee2e8b7c-ad19-4217-80a2-eb0ddc5dc543 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 09:24:25 -0500 Light activity holds promise for combating childhood obesity
聚糖分析有望用于各种癌症的早期诊断将来，一点唾液可能就足以检测出早期的癌症。哥德堡大学的研究人员开发出一种有效的方法来解释癌细胞中糖分子的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Glycan-analysis-holds-promise-for-early-diagnosis-of-various-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Glycan-analysis-holds-promise-for-early-diagnosis-of-various-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede0082c-0177-4376-9daa-73a42adf1518 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 09:05:11 -0500 Glycan analysis holds promise for early diagnosis of various cancers
智能手表帮助医生诊断儿童心律失常斯坦福大学医学院的一项新研究表明，智能手表可以帮助医生检测和诊断儿童心律不齐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Smartwatches-help-physicals-to-diagnose-arrhythmias-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Smartwatches-help-physicals-to-diagnose-arrhythmias-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f9064c6-a582-43ec-969e-e8b752f88a56 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 08:15:50 -0500 Smartwatches help physicians to diagnose arrhythmias in children
表观遗传变化可能导致 2 型糖尿病的发生表观遗传变化是否会导致 2 型糖尿病，或者这些变化仅在人患病后才会发生？隆德大学研究人员的一项新研究为表观遗传变化可能导致 2 型糖尿病的观点提供了更多支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Epigenic-changes-can-contribute-to-the-development-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Epigenic-changes-can-contribute-to-the-development-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=634a64e1-0928-4fb5-a8fb-f528e1d50f59 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:55:33 -0500 Epigenetic changes can contribute to the development of type 2 diabetes
